H0.text: where did the battle of bonhomme richard take place. Off the coast of Boston, Massachusetts

H1.text: where did the battle of bonhomme richard take place. Near the English Channel

H2.text: where did the battle of bonhomme richard take place. Off the coast of Newfoundland, Canada

H3.text: where did the battle of bonhomme richard take place. near Flamborough Head

A4.text: A Franco-American squadron fought the Battle of Flamborough Head with a pair of Royal Navy frigates in the American War of Independence on 23 September 1779.

A5.text: In the engagement, USS Bonhomme Richard and Pallas, with USS Alliance, captured HMS Serapis and HM hired armed ship Countess of Scarborough
